info.name: Better SKS PGP keyservers
info.description: A better looking design for SKS PGP keyserver sites.
info.additionalInfo:
Uses a slightly modified version of basic.css (https://github.com/myhonor16/basic.css)

sites effected: all keyservers listed in the sks-keyservers.net keyserver pool (http://sks-keyservers.net/status/)

Examples:
http://keyserver.ubuntu.com/
http://pgp.mit.edu/
